name: ESPN Let's Play Tennis
overview: Let's Play Tennis takes you onto the court with former U.S. Open Champion Tracy Austin, plus Grand Slam Champions and ESPN tennis commentators Cliff Drysdale and Fred Stolle. You'll build better groundstroke and volleying skills, and learn the opponent. Let's Play Tennis offers easy-to-follow instruction that let's you review any topic you want, any time you like--with no rewinding or fast-forwarding.
